2164.subject: MPA
2164.descrlong: Students will study pep band musical literature, related scales, proper instrumental techniques, appropriate history of musical works, various musical genres, related music theory, musical interpretation, notation, related score analysis, performance techniques and the relationship of pep band music to other art forms.   This course will support the fulfillment of MLO #5 Performance Skills. Prerequisite:  Must be able to read music and play an instrument.  (Credit/No Credit Available)
